Class GameLoop

    • GameEngine.GameLoop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class GameLoop
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class keeps the game running.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameLoop

        public GameLoop(GameEngine gameEngine,
        boolean gameLoop)
        Constructs the GameLoop object.
        Parameters:
        gameEngine - is the game engine object
        gameLoop - is a boolean that determine if the game should start looping or not. Most of the time it will be true but if the user exit the game it will be set to false to stop the thread.
        See Also:
        GameEngine

      • GameLoop

        Constructs the GameLoop object.
        Parameters:
        gameEngine - is the game engine
